definition: (honorific) your inestimable assistance/thanks to your help
ancient cooking cauldron with two looped handles and three or four legs/pot (dialect)/to enter upon a period of (classical)/Kangxi radical 206/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes

sentences.english: If you have any difficulty, we will help you with all our strength.
sentences.chinese: 遇到什麼困難，我們必將全力鼎助。

definition: (honorific) your kind efforts/thanks to your help
to contribute generously (idiom); help sb generously with money/to give generously to charity
to help one another/to come to sb's help
to lead by the hand/to guide/to support
to spare no effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
lit. to loosen one's purse/fig. to give generously to help others
to offer one's life in sacrifice
assistance/a helping hand/to lend a hand
